description: Access Spotify's music catalog and interact with tracks, albums, and artists.

tools.name: get_access_token
tools.description: Get a valid Spotify access token for API requests

tools.name: search
tools.description: Search for tracks, albums, artists, or playlists

type.description: Type of item to search for

tools.name: get_artist
tools.description: Get Spotify catalog information for an artist

id.description: The Spotify ID or URI for the artist

tools.name: get_multiple_artists
tools.description: Get Spotify catalog information for multiple artists

ids.description: Array of Spotify artist IDs or URIs (max 50)

tools.name: get_artist_top_tracks
tools.description: Get Spotify catalog information about an artist's top tracks

id.description: The Spotify ID or URI for the artist

market.description: Optional. An ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code

tools.name: get_artist_related_artists
tools.description: Get Spotify catalog information about artists similar to a given artist

id.description: The Spotify ID or URI for the artist

tools.name: get_artist_albums
tools.description: Get Spotify catalog information about an artist's albums

id.description: The Spotify ID or URI for the artist

limit.description: Maximum number of albums to return (1-50)

offset.description: The index of the first album to return

tools.name: get_album
tools.description: Get Spotify catalog information for an album

id.description: The Spotify ID or URI for the album

tools.name: get_album_tracks
tools.description: Get Spotify catalog information for an album's tracks

id.description: The Spotify ID or URI for the album

limit.description: Maximum number of tracks to return (1-50)

offset.description: The index of the first track to return

tools.name: get_multiple_albums
tools.description: Get Spotify catalog information for multiple albums

ids.description: Array of Spotify album IDs or URIs (max 20)

tools.name: get_track
tools.description: Get Spotify catalog information for a track

id.description: The Spotify ID or URI for the track

tools.name: get_available_genres
tools.description: Get a list of available genres for recommendations

tools.name: get_new_releases
tools.description: Get a list of new album releases featured in Spotify

limit.description: Maximum number of releases to return (1-50)

offset.description: The index of the first release to return

tools.name: get_recommendations
tools.description: Get track recommendations based on seed tracks, artists, or genres

seed_tracks.description: Array of Spotify track IDs or URIs

seed_artists.description: Array of Spotify artist IDs or URIs

tools.name: get_audiobook
tools.description: Get Spotify catalog information for an audiobook

id.description: The Spotify ID or URI for the audiobook

market.description: Optional. An ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code

tools.name: get_multiple_audiobooks
tools.description: Get Spotify catalog information for multiple audiobooks

ids.description: Array of Spotify audiobook IDs or URIs (max 50)

market.description: Optional. An ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code

tools.name: get_audiobook_chapters
tools.description: Get Spotify catalog information about an audiobook's chapters

id.description: The Spotify ID or URI for the audiobook

limit.description: Maximum number of chapters to return (1-50)

market.description: Optional. An ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code

offset.description: The index of the first chapter to return

tools.name: get_playlist
tools.description: Get a playlist owned by a Spotify user

id.description: The Spotify ID or URI of the playlist

market.description: Optional. An ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code

tools.name: get_playlist_tracks
tools.description: Get full details of the tracks of a playlist

id.description: The Spotify ID or URI of the playlist

limit.description: Optional. Maximum number of tracks to return (1-100)

market.description: Optional. An ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code

offset.description: Optional. Index of the first track to return

tools.name: get_playlist_items
tools.description: Get full details of the items of a playlist

id.description: The Spotify ID or URI of the playlist

limit.description: Optional. Maximum number of items to return (1-100)

market.description: Optional. An ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code

offset.description: Optional. Index of the first item to return

tools.name: modify_playlist
tools.description: Change a playlist's name and public/private state

id.description: The Spotify ID or URI of the playlist

name.description: Optional. New name for the playlist

public.description: Optional. If true the playlist will be public

description.description: Optional. New description for the playlist

collaborative.description: Optional. If true, the playlist will become collaborative

tools.name: add_tracks_to_playlist
tools.description: Add one or more tracks to a playlist

id.description: The Spotify ID or URI of the playlist

uris.description: Array of Spotify track URIs to add

position.description: Optional. The position to insert the tracks (zero-based)

tools.name: remove_tracks_from_playlist
tools.description: Remove one or more tracks from a playlist

id.description: The Spotify ID or URI of the playlist

uri.description: Spotify URI of the track to remove

positions.description: Optional positions of the track to remove

tracks.description: Array of objects containing Spotify track URIs to remove

tools.name: get_current_user_playlists
tools.description: Get a list of the playlists owned or followed by the current Spotify user

limit.description: Maximum number of playlists to return (1-50)

offset.description: The index of the first playlist to return

tools.name: get_featured_playlists
tools.description: Get a list of Spotify featured playlists

offset.description: Optional. Index of the first playlist to return

tools.name: get_category_playlists
tools.description: Get a list of Spotify playlists tagged with a particular category

offset.description: Optional. Index of the first playlist to return
